text: The Girl of My Dreams is a lostThe Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:The Girl of My Dreams 1918 silent film romance directed by Louis Chaudet and starring Billie Rhodes.The Girl of My Dreams at silentera.comThe AFI Catalog of Feature Films 1893-1993:The Girl of My Dreams ==Cast== *Billie Rhodes - The Weed *Jack McDonald - George Bassett *Lamar Johnstone - Kenneth Stewart (*as Lamar Johnston) *Golda Madden - Madelin Stewart *Jane Keckley - Ma Williams *Frank MacQuarrie - Pa Williams *Ben Suslow - Jed Williams (*as Benjamin Suslow) *Leo Pierson - Ralph Long ==References== ==External links== * The Girl of My Dreams at IMDb.com * *slide Category:1918 films Category:American silent feature films Category:Lost American films Category:Films directed by Louis Chaudet Category:American black-and-white films Category:American films Category:American romance films Category:1910s romance films
